metadata.title: CVE-2024-35903 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:x86/bpf: Fix IP after emitting call depth accounting Adjust the IP passedto `emit_patch` so it calculates the correct offset for the CALLinstruction if `x86_call_depth_emit_accounting` emits code. Otherwise wewill skip some instructions and most likely crash.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
